text: Oberoi (also spelled as Uberoi, Oberai and Obhrai) is a surname used by the Punjabi Khatri caste of northern India. == Notable people == Well known people who have the name Oberoi, who may or may not be associated with the Khatri caste, include: * Akshay Oberoi (born 1985), American-born Hindi film actor of Punjabi origin, nephew of Suresh Oberoi * Deepak Obhrai (1950-2019), Tanzania- born Canadian politician * Shelly Oberoi, Indian politician == References ==
title: Oberoi (surname)
